TestCase.TestCaseObjective: BSO validation. Test whether the Producer/Provider is able to create the correct MIP data for a MedicalFacility with PendingCasualtyEvacuationCounts and the Consumers are able to correctly understand (and display) it. This case is focused on the MedicalFacility's PendingCasualtyEvacuationCounts element.
TestCase.TestCaseScenario: The Producer creates message elements for MedicalFacility including a PendingCasualtyEvacuationCounts element. The Consumers receive the data and process them.
TestCase.TestCaseEnvironment: Internet or Co-located. Exchange Pattern: R/R, P/S.
TestCase.TestCasePreCondition: The Producer/Provider has created the 'Ground Picture > Infrastructure and Environment' topic (for instance, a Topic where these kind of facilities should belong). The Consumers have subscribed to this topic.
TestCase.TestCaseConclusion: This test is considered a success if the Facility and all attributes and elements are processed and interpreted correctly on all Nations' C2IS.

TestCaseStep.TestCaseStepAction:
The Producer creates the MedicalFacility with name XXX_MFP_462 and fills ALL elements with values, taking special care to set PendingCasualtyEvacuationCounts.
Notices: XXX in name of the object is meant (in principle) to be replaced by the 3 letter code of the country name. Example for the name of the Facility: ESP_MFP_462
TestCaseStep.TestCaseStepResult: Consumers receive and process (and display) the MedicalFacility with PendingCasualtyEvacuationCounts that the Producer created.

TestCaseStep.TestCaseStepAction: The Producer creates an update for the object by changing its PendingCasualtyEvacuationCounts element with other value, keeping the values of the rest of elements.
TestCaseStep.TestCaseStepResult: Consumers receive and process (and display) the MedicalFacility with another PendingCasualtyEvacuationCounts and all elements that the Producer created.
